mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Constructed in 1914, the Southern Building stands as one of only three commissions completed by Daniel Burnham in Washington, D.C. Restored in 1986, the building was provided with a new two-story addition above its main cornice . . . . [Jane Nelson, Project Architect executed at Shalom Baranes Associates] -- http://www.nelsonarch.com/principal/past_experience/southern.htm [work]
